solution_line_template: Uncle Ben has {total_chickens} chickens - {num_roosters} roosters = <<{total_chickens}-{num_roosters}={num_hens}>>{num_hens} hens.
Uncle Ben has {num_hens} hens - {hens_no_eggs} that don't lay eggs = <<{num_hens}-{hens_no_eggs}={egg_laying_hens}>>{egg_laying_hens} hens that lay eggs.
The egg-laying hens each lay {eggs_per_hen} eggs * {egg_laying_hens} hens = <<{eggs_per_hen}*{egg_laying_hens}={total_eggs}>>{total_eggs} eggs.
